products.title: Men's Zip‑Pocket Casual Pants
products.description: Everyday casual pants with zip pockets for secure carry. Slim fit with an elastic waistband and cotton–spandex blend.

products.title: Men's Light Khaki Chino
products.description: Premium chinos made from stretchy cotton blend. Tailored slim fit in light khaki.

products.title: Union 5‑Pocket Comfort Twill Pants
products.description: Straight-fit twill pants with elastic waistband. 83% cotton, 17% spandex—super comfy with five-pocket styling.

products.title: Rip‑Stop Foreman Utility Pants
products.description: Durable work pants made from rip‑stop cotton, garment washed for softness. Relaxed fit with reinforced utility pockets.

products.title: Men's Basic Blue Crewneck T‑Shirt
products.description: Classic crewneck tee in soft cotton. Perfect for everyday wear with a regular fit.

products.title: Men's Premium Tan Blank T‑Shirt
products.description: Minimalist blank tan tee, ideal for layering or standalone style.

products.title: Men's Sleek Black Crew T‑Shirt
products.description: Premium black tee with sleek crew neckline and durable stitching.

products.title: Men's Teal Graphic-Free Tee
products.description: Subtle teal tee, smooth fabric with no graphics—clean and modern.
